# Title {-}

The title of the document can be found at the top of the `.Rmd` file within its preamble, which is shown below. When titling your document, ensure the title is within inverted commas. 

```
---
title: "Example Report"
author: "Annon."
output:
  pdf_document:
          latex_engine: pdflatex
          number_sections: yes
fig_caption: yes
---
```

<br>

**Task**
Give your document a suitable title and your name by copying and modifying the above code into `Week3DA.Rmd`. `Knit` the `.Rmd` file and notice what is produced in the `Week3DA.pdf` file.
